CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, April 11, 1953, page 11, reads: "On The Sidelines - A group of smiling guests enjoy the dance contest held at the Easter Monday dance given by the Parish Council of Holy Cross Episcopal Church. Left to right are Clifford West and daughter, Noni Cyrus; Bettie Stokes, Mrs. Thomas Stokes, Helen Duggar, Mrs. Helen Phillips, Mrs. Lelia Poe, Mrs. Elsie Harris, Mrs. Edwina Harris and Mrs. Lucy Robinson. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of men and women, including left to right: Clifford West, Noni Cyrus, Bettie Stokes, Mrs. Stokes, Helen Duggar, Helen Phillips, Lelia Poe, Elsie Harris, Edwina Harris, and Lucy Robinson, seated in chairs along wall, in interior of the Fort Pitt Hotel with ornate wood paneling and several large wall sconces
